caption: Table 1: Table over the privacy parameters used in each of the plots.
description: This table lists the privacy parameters (ε, εcur, εpast) used in the plots shown in Figures 3 and 4.  For each plot, these parameters were chosen to achieve a mean-squared error (MSE) of 1000 over the stream length T. The parameters vary based on the algorithm (Algorithm 3 or the baseline), the value of λ (for Algorithm 3), and the window size W (for the baseline).
section: A.2 Exact Parameters for the Experiments

caption: Table 1: Table over the privacy parameters used in each of the plots.
description: This table lists the privacy parameters (ε, εcur, εpast) used in the plots shown in Figures 3 and 4 and 5.  For Algorithm 3, the privacy parameter ε is shown for different values of λ.  For the baseline algorithm, the privacy parameters εcur (used for the current interval) and εpast (used for prior intervals) are shown for different values of W (interval length).  The parameters were chosen such that the mean-squared error was fixed at 1000 over the stream length T, where T is 1000 for Figures 3(a), 3(b), and 3(c) and 10⁶ for Figure 4.
section: A.2 Exact Parameters for the Experiments
